item.title: Netflix shares hit initially on Warner Bros. tie-up. What the deal means for the stock
item.description: Rich Greenfield, LightShed Partners co-founder, believes the economics of the transaction are likely to weigh on Netflix before they help in the long ...

item.title: Wall Street traders see good chance for a 'FOMO-driven chase' that lifts stocks into year-end
item.description: Under-invested traders continue to get swayed into participating in the market by the fear of missing out, according to Citadel.

item.title: Wall Street’s top picks for 2026: JPMorgan says a rare biopharma stock could more than triple
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares of Ultragenyx Pharmaceutical soaring more than 200% from current prices.

item.title: Wall Street loves Meta’s reported metaverse cuts. Most analysts see 20%-plus gain for stock
item.description: Analysts believe that Meta's reported metaverse cuts underline its strong cost discipline and continued focus on efficiency and growth.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades rare earth stock, says the U.S. has chosen it as solution to China's dominance
item.description: Morgan Stanley believes that shares of MP Materials could rise another 15% from here.
